Reviews.Title: VTech compared to Motorola MBP36
Reviews.Author: MLStine
Reviews.Content: We bought the VTech Video Monitor a few months ago and were immediately disappointed with the quality of the video and sound. The video was grainy and got worse if you tried to zoom in and the sound cut out constantly so it was not continuous. Another negative was that you could only operate the lullaby feature from the Baby Unit which meant you had to go into the baby's room and turn it on if you wanted to use it. Also, the display brightness was pretty bright, especially for nighttime viewing when your eyes need to adjust. It often hurt my eyes to look at the screen in the middle of the night.Positives for VTech: it has an great feature that allows you to turn off the screen and sound, but when it detects sound from the baby unit, it will turn on automatically (Sound Activation). The negative for that feature was that it wasn't always consistent. Sometimes it would turn on and no sound was coming through the monitor, but this was not a frequent occurance. Another positive is that the lullaby feature has an auto shut off, I believe it was 20 minutes. AND, you could operate the lullaby along with the Sound Activation feature meaning you didn't have to listen to the lullaby yourself through the parent unit because the sound would automatically shut off. This was great for middle of the night lullaby playing, especially because I'm a light sleeper.Also, the lights on the baby unit are pretty dim so it doesn't keep my baby awake and I can see with the night vision pretty well, although grainy because of the picture quality.We ended up returning the VTech because the video was not as great as I thought it should be and the sound quality was starting to bother me when it would just cut out for no reason. Also, when you add a 2nd camera (which we are about to do in a few months) it only views one camera at a time rendering one camera practically useless unless you manually check it throughout the night yourself. This might not be a bad thing for parents of older toddlers, but mine is only 2 and our new baby is coming in July so I'd like to be able to listen up for both of them.For the Motorola monitor, we went with the MBP36 because of the bigger screen and I have to say that the picture quality is far superior to the VTech, however the zoom feature is useless because it zooms in 2x which is too close up. You'd have to place the baby unit far enough away that the zoom would be worth it. So, for us, that feature is a waste.Other Negatives for Motorola: the lullaby feature is annoying. While I love that you can turn it on from the parent unit, it does not have an auto shut off AND you can hear it from the parent unit pretty loudly unless you turn the sound completely off (which means you would not hear your baby crying). Like I said, I'm a light sleeper so the lullaby keeps me awake unless I turn the sound off. So, I end up having to wake up some time later and turning the lullaby off myself and turning the sound back on. It really interrupts sleep having to do all of this at night.Positives for Motorola: the picture quality is much better. I can see more detail and I don't even have to turn the brightness all the way up. the brightness level is much better, even on the lowest setting I can still see at night so it doesn't hurt my eyes to look at it at 3am. I like that you can turn the lullaby feature on yourself without having to get out of bed, but I do wish they would have added an auto shut off to that because having to remember to turn it off is a hassle. The baby unit camera pans further so you can look around the room if you need to and you can pan from the parent unit. The VTech only shifts in one direction and you have to move it directly on the baby unit if you want to change it. It does pan slightly but nothing like the Motorola.The sound quality is much better. It is continuous, though it doesn't have that awesome Sound Activation feature like VTech, I don't hear any feedback/white noise over the monitor. Even on the lowest volume, I can hear my son.Finally, the reason we are keeping the Motorola...when you add another camera it will automatically scan all cameras for 12 seconds each, meaning I don't have to select one camera as the main one. It checks them all throughout the night. This makes me feel more secure knowing that if one baby is crying, i will be alerted no matter what.Honestly, they all have their pros and cons. You have to find what works for you. If they would combine the features of these two monitors, it would be one great unit!

Reviews.Title: returning our second in a month
Reviews.Author: lkp
Reviews.Content: We got out first about a month ago and were initially thrilled with the quality of the video. Then after a couple of weeks the screen started flickering and it was impossible to see the baby. We reset it, and it worked for another couple of days before doing the same thing again and this time the reset did not help at all. We then sent for a replacement and it worked for three days and now the link won't work. I've now requested a refund and am trying to figure out which monitor to get now. Definitely stay away from this one.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Barbara
Reviews.Content: I didn't buy this for baby but for watching my mother in law who has Alzheimer's. She lives in our home and we couldn't survive without this. Good, clear, sound is great, too.

Reviews.Title: Best for the price. Doesn't mess up your wireless
Reviews.Author: Fiva
Reviews.Content: This has everything expensive monitors have for a lot less money. This is my third baby monitor. Even if you don't buy this model make sure you get a baby monitor with voice activation. That white noise is very annoying.Another thing a lot of the monitors cause is mess up your wireless connection. If they work on 2.4GHz for example. This one is the only one I had that was secure and didn't drop my wireless network.The image is very clear. It has temperature alarm (great if baby's room is on the second floor). talk back, zoom.Some reviews complained about the second camera not coming up with noise activation, but the unit vibrates. I leave it on my night stand and the vibration is really intense, enough to wake me up.Don't think more, get this one.

Reviews.Title: VTech makes the best baby monitors
Reviews.Author: Jimmy
Reviews.Content: This monitor is a little larger than others, but works great. The battery last a long time and it always stays linked with each other. We have had problems with other monitors loosing their link and needing to be reset. You can rest peacefully knowing that this monitor will work.

Reviews.Title: Terrible Picture; Glitchy Operation
Reviews.Author: aquieterplace
Reviews.Content: The first afternoon I plugged in this monitor, I got a strange green/striped screen that kept coming in and out (like an old television with bad reception). Once that stopped, I noticed that the monitor kept jumping in and out of night vision mode. And finally, the picture is TERRIBLE. Now, to be fair, I don't expect a baby monitor to show me high definition video of my child's eyelids flickering as she sleeps, but I DO expect to be able to tell the difference between an image of my daughter and a pile of blankets.  Not so with this monitor... even in daylight! If your child does not have dark hair (as noted by another reviewer), you won't be able to tell if she/he is in the crib. I think VTech made an effort the provide a feature-rich monitor at an affordable price, but they just didn't pull it off. The picture on this monitor is, as far as I am concerned, totally worthless. Moreover, since it was behaving so strangely from the minute I plugged it in, I didn't feel like I could trust it. I am in the process of returning this monitor and I have ordered a Motorola instead... hopefully with better results! If you're on a budget and don't want to pay for the Motorola, try the Summer Infant brand, which has a pretty clear picture.  In fact, I was pleased with my Summer Infant model except for the range - which was only 400' "outdoors" and did not suffice for my home.

Reviews.Title: monitor
Reviews.Author: Lynn
Reviews.Content: My husband actually uses this to monitor who is at the door. We have the camera set up on the front porch in a disguise among the plants and the people that come to the door do not realize it is there. The monitor is in his office next to his computer.

Reviews.Title: excellent quality and performance
Reviews.Author: Felipe Sanchez
Reviews.Content: i am very impressed with this monitor because the video quality is great and the night vision feature is amazing. I definitely recommend it and its price is affordable. Well made and it is all you will ever need to monitor your kids.

Reviews.Title: Well made and easy to use.
Reviews.Author: anon
Reviews.Content: I love this thing. i use it to observe my new dogs and remind them not to bark when i leave and return home. I'm sure it will come in handy when I travel and need to leave them in a room for a few minutes. The ability to talk to them from a distance is amazing and they respond with a puzzled look on their faces which is fun. Training dogs not to bark when not there is nearly impossible but this is helping a lot. It's well made and easy to work. Recommend for babies of all kinds. The range for me was half a city block which surprised me.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful monitor! (Don't let the lower reviews scare you...try it for yourself and you'll see.)
Reviews.Author: J. Schmidt
Reviews.Content: I purchased this monitor over a year ago, and it has been wonderful. We have had absolutely no problems with it. The battery life on the parent unit is very good, even after daily use for over a year. The range is excellent as well - I can walk down the street 3 or 4 houses and still have good reception. (It could probably go even farther, but just haven't tried it.) In addition, there have been no problems with interference from our wifi or anything else.Despite some of the reviews, I think the picture is very good and quite clear, maybe not wonderful, but come on, this is a baby monitor, not meant to shoot high resolution videos. I can see my little one very well with the night vision, and when the camera is positioned correctly and zoomed, I could see the rise and fall of his breathing in the early months when the SIDS fear/paranoia was at an all time high for this first time mom. The zoom isn't very clear, but it did the job. No, you can't move the camera using the parent unit, which would be nice but shouldn't be a problem when your baby is confined to a crib. And for toddlers...well, do you really need to watch them every waking/sleeping minute? Plus, if you can hear them moving/doing something and see they are not in bed, common sense should tell you to check on them.As for the white noise, you can turn the sensitivity down, which worked for me (3 is our magic number). Even when I have it set at the highest sensitivity, the white noise really isn't that bothersome. I've never had problems falling asleep, and it has definitely never woken me up.The additional features on this monitor are an added bonus. The lullabies are pretty good, and we've used them a few times. The room temperature indicator is pretty accurate, and you can set an alarm to sound if it gets too hot or too cold in the room. The best thing is the ability to talk to your child through the monitor. I don't think you will find this feature in any other monitor in this price range.Maybe some of these units are flawed, or maybe people have unrealistic expectations for a monitor in this price range or any baby monitor for that matter. I don't know. All I know is the monitor I received was well worth the money and then some. It can compete well with many of the higher end monitors, and is much higher quality than most of the others in this price range. (I've tried others out.)Bottom line...try this monitor and decide for yourself. If you receive a unit like I received, I guarantee, you won't need or want to return it. And with Amazon's A-Z return policy (and free returns for this item), what do you have to lose?

Reviews.Title: LOVE it!
Reviews.Author: RBMarshall
Reviews.Content: We have owned an older model of the Summer Infant Baby monitor since my son was born - It was the only thing within our price range and it was bulky and didn't have that great of a picture; however for $70.00 I couldn't complain. Other video monitors were SO expensive (I'm talking in the $150.00 and plus range) I wouldn't even consider looking into them because I knew I could never put that kind of money into something that wasn't absolutely necessary to have.After coming across this video monitor, at the price - I had to give it a look. Read the reviews, some good some bad (like just about any product nowadays) Decided to give it a try. As a reference - we live in an 800 sq ft. apartment so we don't need  a huge range on this.The monitor arrived rather quickly. Set up was easy and the handheld charged pretty quick. This monitor is amazing! I have absolutely no problem with the video or picture and I love the portability and convenience. The picture quality (especially compared to our last monitor) is crystal clear and I love being able to see him in color.The handheld device has a "walkie talkie" like feature which allows me to talk to my son from the other room if I hear him rustling or getting upset. It also has a zoom feature which we don't use but I can see if we had a different set up how it could come in handy.We actually still kept our other video Summer Infant monitor and have it set up in a different playroom now and it doesn't interfere with the Vtech camera whatsoever which is SO nice!The only thing I would change is the fact that you cant make the camera play its lullaby's from the handheld device. But that's not really ever a big deal because half the time I forget the camera has lullaby's anyway haha (didn't have them before so they're easy to forget)Overall I would highly recommend this product especially at this price! If this was available when our son was born then we would have gone with this one from the beginning.

Reviews.Title: Love this !!
Reviews.Author: Catherine Means
Reviews.Content: This monitor is everything I wanted in a video monitor . It has awesome features like being able to talk to your baby , music and night vision . The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is because the picture quality was less than I expected . It doesnt have good color like in the picture . color is not vivid at all it is almost black and white all the time. You can see everything though so that doesnt bother me .  All in all it is a great monitor for a great price . You wont regret buying it .  I love the peace of mind I have being able to see my son all the time !

Reviews.Title: Great item
Reviews.Author: Raul Gutierrez
Reviews.Content: Had no issuse with it very clear picture with no interference where other monitors ive had had interference this one is clear loud and the zoom feature is a real useful thing.

Reviews.Title: Baby Monitor
Reviews.Author: John N. Bedford
Reviews.Content: The monitor was easy to set up, and works well in daylight or night.  I like the color.  would recommend

Reviews.Title: Nice product
Reviews.Author: Lifes2good
Reviews.Content: I needed a baby monitor that could run both the camera and transmitter on batteries for use in my horse trailer.  This does a great job.  Nice clear picture.  I'm sure it works even better indoors at intended.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Danimal
Reviews.Content: This monitor does exactly what we need it to do. We've had it for over a month now I have really nothing bad to say about it. It does have some minor flaws though. At full volume you get some white noise but it's not loud. It also gets some interference if a cell phone is right next to it and the signal drops momentarily but it's nothing major. The resolution is pretty low and sometimes you have to stare pretty hard at it to see breathing, but the zoom feature usually handles that very well.So far it hasn't had any feedback problems which is very very nice. I would recommend this monitor to anyone and I don't think you could beat it for the price.

Reviews.Title: A wonderful baby monitor
Reviews.Author: Michael J Mc Dermott
Reviews.Content: A step up from our old Infant Optics DXR-5 2.4 GHz Digital Video Baby Monitor with Night Vision, and a third of the price, this is a wonderful product every parent should have.I found the in-room thermometer feature very useful, it alerts you when the room temperature is 85 or higher, that has made a difference in how restless our little guy is at night, letting us turn off his heater or open the door to keep the airflow cool.It can be sensitive to sound, such as the pipes running or someone in another room closing a door, but all this does is activate the microphone letting you hear the white noise. Unlike the Infant Optics which goes into sleep mode if there is no motion, this product keeps the display on at all times which is more comforting to me knowing I can always look in on him sleeping without having to 'wake up' the device.Wish we'd had this one to begin with, can't recommend it enough.

Reviews.Title: Good monitor so far other then one pretty big issue...
Reviews.Author: Chels
Reviews.Content: I've only had this monitor for a couple months and so far it has worked pretty well other then the fact that for some reason it takes about 30 seconds for it to pick up noise. I'll hear my baby crying sometimes and then there's a delay before it comes through the monitor. Size is nice though and picture quality is good.

Reviews.Title: Bang for the Buck!
Reviews.Author: Nichole Vantassell
Reviews.Content: This monitor works beautifully and I am shocked at the quality of it for the great price. My mom has the Infant Optics one at her house, which is the same price, and it does not work anywhere near as good as this one.Lots of great options and settings, we LOVE it!

Reviews.Title: Save the money
Reviews.Author: Larry Davis "The Sign Specialists"
Reviews.Content: This unit would be great, except it never works long enough to get a good review.  For some reason the camera randomly disconnects from the remote screen.  To top it off, it will not connect again until the camera gets shut off and unplugged for a while.  Then you have to go through the re-sync all over again.  Maybe mine is only defective, if that is the case then this unit is pretty slick.

Reviews.Title: Not the best video quality, but works great
Reviews.Author: Holly
Reviews.Content: We bought this monitor to replace an old one we had for 3 years. If comparing the two, the old one (Levana) was much better video quality wise. This one seems very choppy and pixelated. We mainly went with this one because you can pair more than one monitor to the parent unit, and because of the price compared to others. We use this one for our 3 year old who sleeps on the opposite end of the house from us, and will use a second monitor for our new baby in a few months. It may be the distance that causes the poor quality or interference from other electronics in the house. I dislike that you can't turn the video off, only the sound. Our other monitor had the option to turn the whole picture off as well as sound. We tested the sensitivity of the sound and on the highest setting, you had to practically yell to get it to come on. I noticed a complaint was that it was too sensitive, but that is not the case for us. As far as everything else goes, it is a great monitor. Sound quality is great. I love that you can talk back through the monitor-very helpful with our 3 year old. For the price though, you really can't get much better than this. All things considered I would recommend this for a cheap but good video monitor.

Reviews.Title: Do not recommend!!!!!! Go with a brand name.
Reviews.Author: Tan Le
Reviews.Content: The monitor worked fine after purchased (1 star)....but after a few weeks the link stopped working.  A month later we found out that the link is ok after we leave it plugged in.  The battery on it is crap.  So the unit is not portable at all.  We have to bring the charger every where we go.The performance on the unit is very poor.  The graphic is terrible both during the day and night.Customer service is terrible.  I have sent an email regarding the issues about a month ago and yet to get a response.Vtech is a cheap product, priced high.

Reviews.Title: Peace of mind for Mom at a great price - worth every penny!
Reviews.Author: Peggy
Reviews.Content: When my second child was born, I decided to upgrade to a video monitor. I chose this one based on price and range (we have a long house and big yard). Boy do I wish I had bought one for my first child! Our master bedroom is on the first floor so I spent many, many nights running up and down the stairs when my daughter was a baby investigating every little sound I heard on the audio monitor....now I roll over in bed and watch the video! This monitor works very well - it has a very wide range so I can watch my son while doing yard work, it picks up motion activity very well and you can adjust its sensitivity to suit you, the picture quality is very good, I can keep the screen off when in bed and set it to turn it on when activity happens...i bought another camera for the playroom and it was very, very easy to set up and switch back and forth...the negatives are - its hard to see the controls at night...they should make them glow in the dark or something so you can set the volume, etc. in the dark when husbands are sleeping...the zoom function is not very helpful....it needs a belt clip on the parent unit as I do carry it around the house a lot and its a bit awkward...Bottom line - this is a very good monitor for the price. Go for it!

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: T. Booker
Reviews.Content: I've been using this monitor for a few months now with no problems (I use only one camera).  I had a Summer monitor which I had lots of issues with the sound and after about a year and a half it just completely quit working.  I must say that overall I liked the other monitor better (when it worked), but for the price this one is great.  I've read lots of reviews where the Summer monitors quit working after a while and haven't read that complaint on this monitor.  The features are nice, I like that I can talk to her through the parent unit, would be nice if you could start the music from the parent unit.

Reviews.Title: So, So.
Reviews.Author: Juan Olivas "J.Olivas"
Reviews.Content: This product serves the purpose, but a few flaws come with it.  The camera has the problem of losing the link with the monitor,  and also during the day it switches from color to night mode. And last the sound cuts off and turns on again. These are the cons. The pros are these, when the camera decides to work, the link goes a long way. It's a good product my camera I believe is defective.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: ash
Reviews.Content: I have had this unit for over a year now and it still works great. Love that it has night vision and a colored monitor. Only downside I have found is that the sound feature has to be triggered by noise in order to turn on. Would like it if you could leave it on at all times due to it not always turning on when the baby makes noise and sometimes being triggered by passing vehicles. Other than that I am very pleased. As a bonus I can also see the temperature in the room at all times as well.

Reviews.Title: Linking problem just like everyone else!!
Reviews.Author: Kristin E. Martin "Kristin"
Reviews.Content: I loved this monitor.  I was so excited because I got it for a great price.  Last night...it started beeping....the parent and the baby monitors are unable to link.  I tried resetting it for over an hour (1:30 to 3am) Now it's Saturday, I can't call until Monday.  I just want my money back.  I don't want a replacement, I don't want an upgrade.  I just want my money back.  What is the point of a replacement or upgrade.  The monitor obviously has a flaw and I have no idea why Vtech has not addressed this issue.  Either take the monitor off the market or find a solution.

Reviews.Title: Great Baby Monitor
Reviews.Author: 0515ACC15A "J"
Reviews.Content: Works great as a baby monitor and you don't have to worry about someone hacking into your monitor and messing with your child. The only down side is because it's an enclosed system, you can't record the video for later evaluation.

Reviews.Title: OK MONITOR but Parent unit and video is bad
Reviews.Author: Claire
Reviews.Content: This monitor is good for the price but I am now trashing it because the parent unit stop charging after 8 months and now it not working again 14 months later.

Reviews.Title: Excellent....
Reviews.Author: Juan Irungaray
Reviews.Content: Excellent Product, The Sound, and the Quality of the video It's it's Great. Great features for it's Price, The Only Weak Spot, it's the Life  of the battery Charged. it's kind of short the time it works on Battery Operation, but well it's for use in the House, and you can plug it in any wall Outlet.

Reviews.Title: Good but not great
Reviews.Author: Eric Knox
Reviews.Content: We have actually had two of these. The first one broke after about two months. Amazon was great and they exchanged it without any hassle. The second one we have had for about 3 months now. It is working good, the picture quality isn't as good as the first one, even though they are the same model. The sound works good. We don't have any issues with it.

Reviews.Title: Great monitor
Reviews.Author: Sharkstew "NewfieMom"
Reviews.Content: Clear pic, great sound, camera on 2nd floor, monitor on 1st floor. Love the zoom feature, and the lullabies are nice tool.

Reviews.Title: Competely meet my expectations
Reviews.Author: Paola Pecorari
Reviews.Content: I bought this product to monitor my baby of 8 months while she sleeps. Up to now the monitor works without any problems. I fully recomend it.

Reviews.Title: Incredible cost benefit
Reviews.Author: Lia Ludwig
Reviews.Content: I can`t imagine this product having anything else! I was positively impressed by its features and quality compared to its price and the price of its competitors. GREAT baby monitor!

Reviews.Title: This is the BEST GIFT every!
Reviews.Author: Angelia Skelton
Reviews.Content: I love this ! It is great !I watch my grand kids playing in there room.I am thinking of buying another one.

Reviews.Title: Keeping an open eye
Reviews.Author: J. Langford "Golf Lover"
Reviews.Content: This is a great unit.  The sound is great and love the temperature feature.  This has been a very useful shower gift.

Reviews.Title: "It does the job!"  Review downgraded
Reviews.Author: Don
Reviews.Content: Update 2014-05-07:  After having to pair the units each time we used them for the last month, all of a sudden they are staying paired.  Nothing changed so it does not make a lot of sense.==========================My original review is below.  I am downgrading from 4 stars to 2.The functionality is fine.  The problem now is that I have to re-link the camera to the parent unit every time I use it.  Distance (~20-30 feet) is not an issue.I have done the full reset described in the trouble shooting and that seemed to help for a while, but now the linking has gotten worse and worse until now I have to re-link manually for each use.  I will probably do that reset again, but it a pain and I don't want to have to do it often.  It is bad enough to have to re-link each time.I think somewhere in the manual it is mentioned that problems might be caused by other signals.  Modern houses are full of signals (wifi, bluetooth, phones, etc.) and a unit such as this needs to deal with it.Original ReviewI just got this today and I will give it 4 stars.  I don't think I could give it 5 stars unless the the screen had better resolution and color.  Don't get me wrong, the screen is fine for the intended purpose.I bought this here in the Philippines for our new born and I didn't have many choices in this area.  Imported goods are expensive.  I only found 2 locally, this one and a Phillips Avent that was the equivalent of $400 USD!  This one cost me about $150 USD.Before the purchase I was mainly worried that the units would not penetrate our inner and outer concrete block walls.  However, it does just fine and it will transmit from both the front and back yards.  I tested it out to about 100 ft or so.  You can't see the screen in bright sunlight but that is normal for any LCD.All of the features work as advertised.  The night infrared viewing works well.  There was one unknown feature that I did not see mentioned, but it is quite handy.  The camera unit has a tripod mount on the bottom, so I mounted it on my older lightweight tripod.  We can easily move it to any place where we need it positioned, and easily adjust height, angle, etc.  Most likely I will never use the included wall mount.

Reviews.Title: Hopeful
Reviews.Author: leslie ennis
Reviews.Content: We have LOVED this monitor, and have taken it with us anywhere we went overnight. It has been great.However, we have had it less than a year, and just yesterday, the parent unit stopped working. I have contacted their customer service. If they are helpful and will replace the parent unit for us, then without a doubt, I will change this to a 5 star review!I will post again and let everyone know how they treat their customers. I am hopeful that it will be a great experience!

Reviews.Title: Ratings good
Reviews.Author: PATRICIA MANGILI
Reviews.Content: I think the product is very good and qualityI recommend it to all families who want to monitor their babies

Reviews.Title: great way to keep an eye out
Reviews.Author: Consuelo Delgado "Consuelo Delgado"
Reviews.Content: got this as a present for the new mama, and she loves this, knows when the baby cries and needs to go into the room to check on her.  also they got a second camera to watch the kids play room, so everyone is getting the watch treatment. and it's a great way, to be away and know what the kids are talking about.

Reviews.Title: Works beautifully.
Reviews.Author: DEF_Amazon
Reviews.Content: Excellent price/performance. If the features meet your needs, then you'll be happy with this baby monitor. Made a great gift.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: liltrini
Reviews.Content: As a first time mother, I was concerned about my baby movement at all time. This product works really well. Sound quality is excellent.  I can be anywhere in the house and see my baby. The lullabies is a nice touch. Which volume was a little louder.  Overall wonderful product

Reviews.Title: a moma"s best friend. a definite Must
Reviews.Author: JacquelynWoidt
Reviews.Content: so clear n love the functions n that i can have more than one camera so i never hafta unplug them

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Darren E from Trini
Reviews.Content: I have only tested this out so far beacuse our little bundle of joy has not yet arrived....but from testing it out the video quality is great, the night vision works, and the sound is clear. I will post future updates once our little one is finally here and I start to use it for real.

Reviews.Title: Frees Me Up
Reviews.Author: Backyard Images
Reviews.Content: I keep my grandson five days a week while both of his parents work. I also have a lot of things I like to do--flower garden, play keyboard, etc.--that I can do only while my grandson is asleep or after he leaves. This little device keeps me aware of his every move while I am pursuing my other tasks around the house. In fact, as I type this review, one eye is on the monitor siting to the right of my keyboard. The picture quality isn't great, but it is pretty good, and I can zoom in to see up close. It's worth the money and the peace of mind.

Reviews.Title: Works perfectly!
Reviews.Author: M. Livingston
Reviews.Content: I love this baby monitor.  It was one of the cheaper ones I could find that look like it was of good quality.  It was definitely money well spend.  The picture quality is great!  I have the first camera in my baby's room and a second camera in my 4 year olds room and I love being able to flip between cameras to make sure they are both ok at night.  Also, I like that you can set the sound sensitivity to that if the baby is make low noises I don't have to be alerted.  I usually keep in in vibrate mode with a low sound sensitivity so that it only vibrates when the baby is really crying, which means I get a better sleep and so does my baby.

Reviews.Title: Great range and no interference!
Reviews.Author: Carolina Gutierrez
Reviews.Content: I have 4 different monitors and this is the only One I use because it has huge range, is interference free and the image is very clear

Reviews.Title: Exactly What We Expected
Reviews.Author: Hope This Helps
Reviews.Content: This monitor is exactly what we expected and we are very happy with it. We specifically like that the parent unit can be on mute and still show volume bars. The picture is clear and the zoom feature is helpful. The temperature display is a great feature.

Reviews.Title: Best Baby Purchase
Reviews.Author: JJK
Reviews.Content: I wasn't sure I needed a video monitor, but went ahead and purchased this one anyway.  It might be one of the best baby purchases we made.  I've been using it for about 4 months and it's been fantastic.  Good range, good sound and picture quality.  No complaints.  For the price it's a no brainer!

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Dewars11
Reviews.Content: Bought the Astak and returned the next day. Horrible picture and all static.This unit is great. No complaints, clear picture/reception.Used camera on main floor and was in the basement with the hand held and never lost any reception.Great price and buy.

Reviews.Title: Love this!
Reviews.Author: chiss
Reviews.Content: We actually bought this to use in our barn for when our miniature horses are about ready to have their colts.  This works awesome!  We have the moniror inside the barn above  the stall and the monitor is in our house.  Our barn is quite a distance from our house, we have a garage and swimming pool inbetween the distance of our house and barn. This is quite a distance and the sound and picture is so clear!  the infrared works great at night.

Reviews.Title: Great buy, Great Price
Reviews.Author: Crowyer
Reviews.Content: we only have this set, no extra camera. It works wonderful and its great. The only issue is sometimes my child cannot understand what is being said when i am talking to her over the monitor. Also i would have like to have seen the music controls on the receiver itself.

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised
Reviews.Author: Ftec "RjD"
Reviews.Content: Nice little Camera. Bought as a gift for new parents but would be nice to have one myself. Very Clear Picture and works great at night. Should make new Parents feel all warm and fuzzy. Im old school audio was good enough but not nowadays. Good Deal...

Reviews.Title: Green screen
Reviews.Author: L. R. Nguyen "Didir1010"
Reviews.Content: After not even a month the display is turning shades of green and it is very hard to see my son.

Reviews.Title: great invention
Reviews.Author: VA
Reviews.Content: My son and daughter-in-law have been using this for two months and are very happy with it.  The cordless feature is a plus.  The video is helpful to monitor the sleeping child without looking in on her.  The audio works great when she is out of hearing range.

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: Margaret Scherr
Reviews.Content: Using this in an elderly adult's bedroom.  Works well enough, but I'm unable to use the Vibration feature.  He moves around too much and it wakes me up all night.  I'm relying on the change in sound to wake me up.  That doesn't contribute to a decrease in rating, because it's unique to our situation.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: Noname
Reviews.Content: Bought this product to replace a different type of monitor and camera we had that quit working. This product has worked perfectly and is way better than the one we previously had. We had to use a separate sound monitor with the other camera because when the volume was on it constantly made noise. This one is completely quiet and not near as bright either. Would absolutely recommend this product!

Reviews.Title: Baby Monitor
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: Awesome, easy to use and crystal clear, would definately recommend to by this. Great Price and it can't be beat!

Reviews.Title: Excelent monitor
Reviews.Author: Xtian
Reviews.Content: I bought this for our second baby, after spending $130 on a samsung wireless baby cam (it was awful-you can reed my review also) we decided to go back to basic and purchase a monitor that do not work on WiFi.This monitir have pretty good features like in-display room temperature that comes in handy, the lulabys really soathe the baby (it would be better if the volume could be higher tough), the parent unit has a large color screen and the battery seems to last long enough.The signal is pretty good between the two units even without deploying the antenas

Reviews.Title: Good monitor for its price
Reviews.Author: John Yeager
Reviews.Content: We previously had a Summer video monitor and as a monitor it worked well.  That said the Summer monitor broke after only one year, which I think is ridiculous given the cost.  The fault was in the Several of my cons about this model are things the Summer monitor did.  That said if I was choosing now I would still choose the VTech since I think the pros are better.Pros *Great range, I had a hard time with the Summer device in a small home and couldn't use it in a bigger house however this device has great range. *Batteries can be used for the camera which is nice when power is not easily available. *Large screen, makes everything easy to see. *Cost, the low cost is great, I bought mine on sale for $99.Cons *Video is not awesome, that said its more than adequate for watching a baby. *Audio on/off is a bit annoying but that said you can get used to it.

Reviews.Title: Great range.
Reviews.Author: HELENA ARGENTA
Reviews.Content: It is the second baby monitor I buy the same model. I bought the first 3 months since I read it was that had the best range among all the others I researched. My apartment has 2 floors and wireless devices generally do not work around it, and this works. So I bought this to leave the house of my mother. The screen colors are not as vivid but works well.

Reviews.Title: Excelent
Reviews.Author: Fredy H
Reviews.Content: Good sound, good image, great range! I would like to be able to start the lullaby songs from monitor.Recomended!Muy buen sonido e imagen, gran alcance! Ojalá se pudieran activar las canciones desde el monitor.Recomendado!

Reviews.Title: Better than my Motorolla for  big bucks
Reviews.Author: ALJ
Reviews.Content: Very impressive,  everything works as described.  Distance and thru wall reception is great, we monitor the baby in the bedroom from the outside spa, at the opposite end of the home.

Reviews.Title: No problems, great unit
Reviews.Author: JJ
Reviews.Content: This product has been great. It was assembled and working within five minutes of opening. The intercom feature works well. I LOVE that it is encrypted. It easily woke me to alert me that my child was crying. Both of my sister-in-laws were very impressed and are thinking about purchasing. So far, it has been a great deal. Honestly, I don't have twins and I think it is a little absurd to keep a baby monitor in my child's room if she is old enough to go to school, so any issues with multiple cameras won't apply to me.

Reviews.Title: Smart Product
Reviews.Author: nite
Reviews.Content: I bought this without reading too much about the features.  I've been using it for a week and so far it's been great.  There is a thermostat, a talk to the parent unit feature and a couple of things.  I just hope it continues to function as it is functioning now for years to come.  I would recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Great device
Reviews.Author: M. Reinitz "famof6"
Reviews.Content: This monitor is perfect for our needs! We have three cameras and they all work well and they are simple to link. The monitor is a good size and the range is incredible! I love how easy it is to navigate the menu and the intercom is used all the time whether I need to talk to my older kids who are on a different level of the house or soothing my baby back to sleep. I love that I can use the stand to place it on a table or counter. There are no complaints about this monitor or cameras! I am very happy with this purchase!

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: zpromaine
Reviews.Content: Product does exactly what it says, image is great and there are a lot of features, especially if you plan on adding more cameras at a later time.

Reviews.Title: I love all the features on this monitor
Reviews.Author: Tita
Reviews.Content: I'm writing this review based on the product itself because I have not yet had my baby. I'll probably come back in a few weeks and update it, but for now I'm really liking this monitor. I have 3. I purchased the Angelcare motion detection monitor without video because the video one was #1 very expensive and #2 did not have very good reviews. The Angelcare is awesome btw; it detects if the baby stops breathing. Anyway, I was given a Summer Infant monitor, but it's those big tv like black and white screens and it's not portable, so I chose to purchase this one. The only reason I'm not giving it 5 stars is because the screen is too thick to fit in my pocket, but it is certainly not an issue. It does have a clip, so you can clip it on, but it will only work well if you're wearing jeans. I'm sure I'll somehow manage to drop it if it's clipped on. The screen is a good size and it's very clear. The sound is also very clear and you cannot hear static while it's quiet. If you have more than one child, you can buy an additional camera and the screen splits so you can watch both at the same time. It has a temperature indicator which is good to have (Angelcare also comes with that feature). It has a stand so you can stand it up for easy view at night. You can talk to your baby as well although I cannot comment on how useful this feature is.  It has all the features the higher priced items have. The battery is rechargeable and I have not yet tested how long it lasts, but if you leave it charging it at night, it should serve its purpose during the day. For me, I do not forsee this being an issue. It also has a greater range than many of the other products I researched, which is useful if we are outside.

Reviews.Title: very useful / muy util
Reviews.Author: Carlos Contreras
Reviews.Content: great image and night vision too, very clear sound, has bidirectional speaker, long range radio, 5 melodies to sleep the baby, also has its mount, the camera angle is adjustable both vertical and horizontal, you can know how is the temperature in the baby's place. the bad thing is that the zoom only has 1 approaching and the melodies has low volume. equally I recomend it, it's functional at low cost.tiene gran imagen y en vision nocturna tambien, el sonido es muy claro, tiene funcion de walkie talkie, radio de largo alcance, 5 melodias para dormir al bebe tambien tiene su montura y se puede ajustar el angulo de camara tanto vertical como horizontal. puedes saber como esta la temperatura en lugar donde esta el bebe. lo malo es que el zoom solo tiene un solo acercamiento y las melodias suenan con muy bajo volumen. de igual manera lo recomiendo es muy funcional y a bajo costo.

Reviews.Title: Works Perfect
Reviews.Author: Jode Bode
Reviews.Content: I got this unit to monitor my 85 yo mother-in-law while she slept. The infrared worked wonderfully during the night. The sound is sensitive enough I could acutally hear her breathing. Love, love, love this device. This monitoring unity gives me a bit more freedom to move about with far less worry.

Reviews.Title: Loooove it
Reviews.Author: Ashley
Reviews.Content: This is an awesome monitor we have a four year old and one on the way and we absolutely looove it we can keep an eye on both kids at the same time. It's easy to hook up and easy to add more cameras.

Reviews.Title: The camera could be more adjustable
Reviews.Author: Bruce
Reviews.Content: The camera could be more adjustable or could have any support to inclinable in order to get better view from sleeping baby

Reviews.Title: Bad ppl, bad company
Reviews.Author: chris
Reviews.Content: This is the worst company you can do business with. Cheating, there is a lot of other companies better, please don't do any business with Vtech Communications Inc.
